release_notes: UX IMPROVEMENTS: Simplified gain settings to 5 levels (Low 20dB, Medium-Low 27dB, Medium 34dB, Medium-High 41dB, High 48dB) plus Auto Gain. Added clear FTDI autogain notice in Settings modal explaining hardware limitations. Added 'Disabled' option for SDRs in both wizard and settings. Improved user experience with intuitive gain selection and better documentation of FTDI constraints.
